CONNECT TO Organic Beard Supply

current.registration_text: Registering allows you to access your order status and history. You will only need to provide information necessary to make the purchase process faster and easier.
current.sub_tetx_about_me:
Aroma is at the heart of AromaCare product. Each product features a unique aroma formulated through the art and science of Ayurveda, which relies on the aromatherapeutic properties of plants. Our AromCare aromas are blended using flower and plant extracts that are distilled to their very essence to utilize their natural power.


Shop Aromacare
current.info_shop_1: Our mission is to cultivate a harmonious and responsible relationship between plants, humans, and the earth.
current.info_shop_2: Our culture is rooted in kindness, respect, and compassion. Basically, we love the plants and humans that inhabit our planet.
current.text_info_contact_us:

settings.title: Shipping & Delivery
settings.code:
We want your experience with OBS to be easy, hassle-free, and enjoyable. If, for any reason, you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, you may return your items within 14 days of purchase for an exchange, store credit, or full refund.

FREE SHIPPING
Free and fast domestic shipping for all orders over $50

RISK FREE RETURN
If you're not 100% satisfied, return your order within 14 days.

settings.title: About OBS
settings.html:
OBS offers a line of organic, plant based, nonGMO apothecary products for bearded men. Rooted in Ayurveda, we hand select and combine ingredients proven to help you and your beard feel great all day, every day. We also love the plants and humans that inhabit our plant.

Handcrafted by humans in the USA
hello@organicbeard.supply

settings.title: AromaCare
settings.banner_content:
Introducing AromaCare

Featuring unique aromas rooted in Ayurveda.

Introducing AromaCare

Introducing AromaCare

Each AromaCare product features a unique aroma formulated through the art and science of Ayurveda., which relies on the aromatherapeutic properties of plants to rejuvenate the body and mind.

settings.custom_html:
#plantbased #beardcare

What badass barbers
recommend.

Give yourself some love with products that badass barbers recommend to their guests on a daily basis.

Shop All Collections

settings.title: Premium-Responsible-Apothecary
settings.richtext:
OBS is a line of organic, plant based, nonGMO apothecary products for bearded men.

Rooted in Ayurveda, we hand select and combine ingredients proven to help you and your beard feel great all day, every day.

settings.title: About OBS
settings.richtext:
We believe in kindness, respect, and compassion. Our mission is to cultivate a harmonious and responsible relationship between plants, humans, and the earth.

Basically, we love the plants and humans that inhabit our planet.

settings.title:
Introducing AromaCare
Stronger, Fuller Beard
settings.sub_title:
prevent itch, reduce irritation
thicken beard | moisturize skin | plant based

settings.author: Jai Perry
settings.quote: I'm always testing new products, on myself and in my shop. These are some of the best I've come across plus my guests love them.

settings.author: Vlad Cruz
settings.quote: These products are my absolute favorite. I can never have enough. They're worth rubbing a little extra under the nose - I just want to smell it all day.

settings.subtitle: Stay hip to the jive
settings.subtext: We love sharing beard care tips with our friends. We also like letting our friends know ahead of time about new product launches and updates. Want to be friends?

settings.author: Jai Perry
settings.quote: I'm always testing new products, on myself and in my shop. These are some of the best I've come across plus my guests love them.

settings.author: Vlad Cruz
settings.quote: AromaCare is my absolute favorite, I can't get enough. These products are worth rubbing a little extra under the nose - I just want to smell it all day.

settings.author: Aidan Harvey
settings.quote: Totally love Cardamom and Cedarwood from the AromaCare collection. Smells great, doesnt leave me feeling greasy, and really works to keep my beard soft and manageable.

settings.title: Give yourself some space.
settings.sub_title: Auto-ship plant based beard care directly to your door on a schedule that works for you.
